directions: Harvest ripe olives from olive trees.
Wash the olives thoroughly with water to remove any dirt or debris.
Crush the olives to extract the oil from the fruit.
Transfer the crushed olives to a press or mill.
Apply pressure to the olives to separate the oil from the solids.
Collect the extracted olive oil in a container.
Allow the olive oil to settle and separate from any remaining water or sediment.
Strain the olive oil through a fine mesh to remove any impurities.
Store the olive oil in a clean, airtight container away from direct sunlight.
